snippet: A decision on hydrofracking in New York State — its scope, its timing or whether it will happen at all — now seems much more uncertain, and the approval process has slowed considerably.
abstract: Decision on whether to allow hydrofracking in New York State seems more uncertain than in 2011, and approval process has slowed considerably, despite almost four years of study, debate and intense lobbying on both sides.
lead_paragraph: A decision on hydrofracking in New York State — its scope, its timing or whether it will happen at all — now seems much more uncertain, and the approval process has slowed considerably.

headline.seo: In Albany, a Decision on Natural Gas Drilling Suddenly Seems Less Certain
headline.main: After Early Gallop, Albany Slows to Crawl in Making Decision on Gas Drilling
headline.print_headline: After Early Gallop, Albany Slows to Crawl in Making Decision on Gas Drilling
